sellerCard.description:
Hello, I am Antoni. I am a web developer. I develop custom sites. From my past 3-year work experience as a Back-end web application developer at Robi Axiata Ltd.
 
My professional area:
1. Responsive website with html5
2. Css3
3. Bootstrap
4 JavaScript (JQuery)
5. Bootstrap

Development of any kind of website with 
1. PHP (object Oriented) & MySQL
2. JavaScript (JQuery)
3.  Ajax

Projects
*PSD to Html5
* Business Website
* Blogging website
* E-commerce development
* Newspaper site
* School Management System
* Hospital Management
* Office Management system
* Hotel Reserve System
Throw queries

description.content:
Hello,

I am a back-end developer. I will develop your website's user interface sector with a login-register system and a modern admin dashboard. Please See my Packages.


If you have a website built with HTML & CSS and need to develop a user interface system or want to build a Custom admin panel then this gig is for you.


BASE

  1. Admin - Registration- Login-Forgot password-Admin Panel-User List- User Edit.
  2. User - Registration- Login-Forgot password-User Panel-Profile- Edit Profile.


CHARACTERISTIC

  • Front-end Html & Css
  • Back-end PHP & Database Language MySQL
  • Fully - Responsive - Multi Type device
  • Registration & Login - Email Verification
  • Dynamic form validation
  • Page Acess Restriction Based on the role
  • Hosting Set up (Share hosting)
  • Here you will get all the Options for handling registered users. Create-Edit-Delete

The cost for the Extra functional page you want on your website will be counted according to per page/$5-based on function (Front-end & Back-end)


***You will get Unlimited Revision after Delivery until you say 'OK'***


If you need anything out of my package Please inbox me or see my other gig.

Thanks for your valuable time

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies will you use to develop the portal?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will use PHP for the server-side scripting and MySQL for the database. The front end will be designed using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for a responsive and modern UI.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How secure will the portal be?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Security is a top priority. I will implement password hashing, SQL injection prevention, CSRF protection, XSS protection, and limit login attempts to protect against brute force attacks. Additionally, I offer optional two-factor authentication (2FA) for added security.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can the portal be customized to meet my specific requirements?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! The portal can be tailored to fit your unique needs, including additional features, design preferences, and specific functionality.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to manage users and their roles?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the admin panel will allow you to view, edit, delete, and manage all user accounts. You can also assign different access levels and roles to users and administrators.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How will you handle password management and recovery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The portal includes features for users to reset their passwords via email and change their passwords securely. Passwords will be stored using secure hashing algorithms.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide documentation and support after delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide well-commented code and comprehensive documentation for easy maintenance and understanding. Additionally, I offer an unlimited period of free support for bug fixes and minor adjustments after delivery until you say ok!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I need additional features not listed in the gig description?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm open to discussing any additional features you may need. Please contact me to discuss your requirements, and I will provide a custom solution and quote based on your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long will it take to complete the portal?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeframe depends on the complexity and specific requirements of your project. Generally, a standard user-admin login registration portal can take 5 days to 1 week. A detailed timeline will be provided after discussing your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I encounter an issue after the free support period ends?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm always here to help! You can reach out to me for any future support or enhancements. I will give free support for what I have taken money from you until the project is bug-free. We can discuss a maintenance plan or one-time service fees for further assistance.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer any demo or preview before the final delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Actually, it is not necessary to preview the demo before delivery. From start to end you will observe your project on a live server.

reviews.comment:
I paid Antoni to implement a login system with an admin panel on my website. 

He delivered on time, and went above and beyond to meet my needs, with remarkable reactivity.

These 5 stars are entirely deserved, and I am already planning to work with him again.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for trusting me and working with me. We will work together again.

reviews.comment: Excellent work, worked above and beyond the scope of work agreed on. Went the extra mile to understand and repeat instructions for clarification. Will be using again for future projects.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. I am glad to be a part of your project and hope we will work together on the next project.

reviews.comment: Great work and impressive quality and responsiveness

seller_response.comment: Thank you for choosing me as a developer for your project.

reviews.comment: its good guy, and good communication

Antoni is a very professional individual with high standards when it comes to quality and on-time delivery. Provides very good support. Looking forward to future collaboration. 
Omar

seller_response.comment: Always will be there for being a good web Developer.
